= Milestone 1: Larus =
Two clients can connect to the server and chat with each other. Although they can't see each other on the map yet.

== Requirements ==
=== Server ===
  * Up and running.
  * Handle the ingame-chat.
  * Communicate how the map looks like.

=== Client ===
  * Available online at a website as an applet.
  * Possible for two clients to connect and chat with each other.
  * Have an animated player-controlled character.
  * Get map-info from the server and show it with the clients mapdata.

== Schedule ==
It should be done before the 15th of November.
